Bindings.Binding: if (keystate == "up") then local gUI4 = GP_LibStub("GP_AceAddon-3.0"):GetAddon("gUI4") gUI4:ToggleLock() end

if (keystate == "up") then if IsAddOnLoaded("GroupCalendar5") and (GroupCalendar) and (GroupCalendar.UI) and (GroupCalendar.UI.Window) then if GroupCalendar.UI.Window:IsShown() then GroupCalendar.UI.Window:Hide() else GroupCalendar.UI.Window:Show() end else if not(CalendarFrame) then LoadAddOn("Blizzard_Calendar") end ToggleCalendar() end end
